thread.title: Jubilee parties to merge in December
thread.title_full: Jubilee parties to merge in December

title: Jubilee parties to merge in December
text:
Monday, October 26, 2015 Jubilee parties to merge in December Meru Senator Kiraitu Murungi (left) and Governor Peter Munya converse at Meru Technical Training Institute during a fundraiser on October 9, 2015. Jubilee-affiliated parties are set to merge in December to form the Jubilee Party, Mr Murungi has announced. PHOTO | PHOEBE OKALL | NATION MEDIA GROUP Advertisement 
Jubilee-affiliated parties are set to merge in December to form the Jubilee Party, through which President Uhuru Kenyatta will vie for the presidency in 2017 
Speaking at the end of a meeting by the steering committee that is spearheading the merger, Meru Senator Kiraitu Murungi said nine other committees will work to ensure a smooth transition. 
He said there would be various sensitisation forums to be held in counties on the matter. 
The steering committee will also meet with politicians, including senators and governors, Mr Murungi said 
Mr Murungi is the co-chairman of the steering committee.
